doc.field: C M F f2141reute u f BC-inspiration-cop-price 04-01 0046
INSPIRATION LOWERS COPPER PRICE TO 66.50 CTS/LB

Inspiration Consolidated Copper Co, a subsidiary of Inspiration Resources Corp, said it is lowering its base price for full-plate copper cathodes one-half cent to 66.50 cents a lb, effective immediately. Reuter
